rows.label: qev025112_MSG0001
rows.name: You're the one from... Ha! You're late![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0002
rows.name:
And why come running to that Ackwar scum's rescue
anyway, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0003
rows.name: Don't ya know what the little monster did?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0004
rows.name:
No. You're like them, ain't ya? Think the customer's
always right, which gives you the chance to heap
abuse on the heads of the working man...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0005
rows.name: In that case, I sentence you to DEATH![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_JNK0010
rows.name: React Angrily

rows.label: qev025112_SEL0011
rows.name:
Demand that he take back his
unkind words about Ackwar.

rows.label: qev025112_JNK0020
rows.name: React Calmly

rows.label: qev025112_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask who is piloting the Skell.

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0006
rows.name: You think that trash deserved to live?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0007
rows.name:
Well what about my WIFE, huh? If not for him,
she'd still be alive! What does SHE deserve?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0008
rows.name:
Forget grenade pizza... I shoulda forced a live grenade
right down his stinkin' Ma-non throat![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0009
rows.name:
Shoulda chopped him to bits and used him for a
secret topping. Would have gone well with my famous
"Papa Powell's pizza sauce"![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0010
rows.name: You still don't get it? You're as slow as Ackwar![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0011
rows.name:
I'll give you a clue—grenade pizza!
Blast of salami and cheese straight to the gut?
Favorite of hateful little Ma-non everywhere?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0012
rows.name: ...Now don't tell me you forgot ol' Powell already?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0013
rows.name:
I figure you're not like those gluttonous freaks who just
eat any old pizza I throw out...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0014
rows.name:
Good thing I had a buddy from my old line of work
scrounge up a Skell for me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_JNK0030
rows.name: Ask about Ackwar

rows.label: qev025112_SEL0031
rows.name: Demand to know what happened to Ackwar.

rows.label: qev025112_JNK0040
rows.name: Ask about Powell

rows.label: qev025112_SEL0041
rows.name: Question Powell about his past.

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0015
rows.name: My pizzas pack more punch than most.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0016
rows.name:
One bite, and Duduma, Gerome, and Ackwar's woman
were all hooked.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0017
rows.name:
And when I called the little idiot, now buried in the
ground over there, and told him I had a clue about
the killer, he came a'running...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0018
rows.name:
Just in time to taste the special grenade pizza I'd fixed
him! Ah ha ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0019
rows.name:
Guess he'd been working so hard he forgot to eat.
He dove at that pie like a starving dog![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0020
rows.name:
Ha ha ha! Guess your help wasn't enough to keep him
alive after all![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0021
rows.name:
He'd narrowed it down to poison, but had no clue it
was my grenade pizzas that were carrying it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0022
rows.name:
Hah! I gave all those Ma-non the house special—one
grenade pizza with the works as their send-off to hell!
And you don't even wanna know why?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0023
rows.name:
Instead you want a history lesson? Well, never let it be
said that Army Pizza let a customer down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0024
rows.name:
I was special forces back on Earth. Did every dirty job
the army threw my way without whining or complaint.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0025
rows.name:
Like, oh say...drugging diplomats and arranging for a
little fall so it looked like suicide?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0026
rows.name:
Or maybe attaching bombs to POWs to loosen their
traitorous tongues?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0027
rows.name:
Hell, I even took an enemy officer's family captive and
fed 'em to crocodiles once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0028
rows.name:
So I figured I'd give those Ma-non bastards a taste of
the works. It was my final gift to that monster Ackwar
before I put him in the ground.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0029
rows.name:
You got this dumb look on your face, like "But why?"
Well, I'll tell you...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0030
rows.name:
Revenge. Revenge on the bastards who destroyed the
one thing I cared about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0031
rows.name:
The Ma-non aren't people. They're animals!
Ravenous, mindless hyenas![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0032
rows.name:
Every day my wife would run around delivering pizzas,
and every day they'd hound her with complaint after
complaint after complaint...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0033
rows.name:
"This pizza's so so hot! It burned me!"
Well, GOOD! Pizza's SUPPOSED to be hot![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0034
rows.name:
"The cheese is too too melty! This is two minutes late,
isn't it? The slices are not all the exact same size, no?"
Blah blah blah SHADDAP ALREADY![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0035
rows.name:
Day after day after DAY... One insane complaint after
the other... My wife, she...she couldn't take it.
Her nerves were shot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0036
rows.name:
I could tell she wanted to scream at the SIGHT of
pizza, but still...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0037
rows.name:
She'd just put a sad little smile on her face and keep
on delivering those pizzas. For me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_JNK0050
rows.name: Empathize

rows.label: qev025112_SEL0051
rows.name: Express sympathy for Powell's wife.

rows.label: qev025112_JNK0060
rows.name: Scoff

rows.label: qev025112_SEL0061
rows.name: Say that's no justification for cold-blooded murder.

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0038
rows.name:
You...you mean it? Hell, maybe you ain't like them
after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0039
rows.name: But this story keeps going.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0040
rows.name:
Cram it! You don't know! You don't know how this
story ENDS![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0041
rows.name:
It was pouring that day, but she just put that smile on
her face and headed out. And that's when Ackwar hit
her with the final complaint.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0042
rows.name:
"The salami is not evenly distributed among the
slices, is it?" he said. "Replace it at once."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0043
rows.name: That whiny little monster pushed her over the edge![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0044
rows.name:
Is a little salami worth more than a human life? Huh?
WELL IS IT?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0045
rows.name:
She couldn't take it any more, so on her way home,
she...she killed herself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0046
rows.name:
But I know it was really Ackwar who pulled the trigger.
He and those other animals backed her into a corner![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0047
rows.name:
And then! THEN! Then the bastard has the nerve to call
me up and complain that his replacement pizza never
ARRIVED![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0048
rows.name: I'll never forgive 'em! Or anyone who sides with 'em![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0049
rows.name:
They used to call me the Hellfire Margherita back in the
army—it's time to show you how I earned that name![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025112_MSG0050
rows.name: I'll sear you to a golden crisp![ST:wait ]
